topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541a69966368727a61650100#post_541a69966368727a61650100

It's definitely poorly paced. Ofcourse that tends to happen when you make stuff up as you go along. And for the first three acts go by user submitted questions, then stop around the 4th.

...and yet I still like it for some reason.

*resigned shrug*

topics.body:
We talkin about fanfics? Cause I just wanted to throw this out there for a bit.

I found what is possibly the worst fanfic ever, if you ask me. Gravity Falls: The Ruins.

I can legitimately say My Immortal and StarFox Exchange Student (a novel long self insert fic), both of which I listened to 90 % of in Film Night...are better.
